sentences.en: an investigation to bring to light examples of extravagant expenditure.
sentences.cn: 一场使挥霍浪费的事实真相大白的调查。

sentences.en: Blend the butter with the sugar and beat until light and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把糖掺入黄油然后搅拌至滑软细腻。

sentences.en: Eventually the lights turned green.
sentences.cn: 绿灯终于亮了。

sentences.en: He crossed to the bedside table and put out the light.
sentences.cn: 他走到床头柜的另一边关了灯。

sentences.en: He stopped to light a cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他停下来点了一支烟。

sentences.en: Her hand was just visible by the light from the sitting room.
sentences.cn: 借着起居室的灯光，勉强能看见她的手。

sentences.en: Here in the hills, the light failed more quickly.
sentences.cn: 在山区这儿，天黑得更快。

sentences.en: I couldn’t get the candles to light.
sentences.cn: 我点不着蜡烛。

sentences.en: I lit the fire and poured a drink.
sentences.cn: 我生好火，倒了一杯酒。

sentences.en: I noticed a chink of light at the end of the corridor.
sentences.cn: 我注意到走廊尽头的一缕光线。

sentences.en: I read by the light of the fire.
sentences.cn: 我借着火光读书。

sentences.en: I switched on the light in the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我打开卧室的灯。

sentences.en: I wanted a lighter yellow paint for the walls.
sentences.cn: 我想要一种颜色更浅的黄色墙面涂料。

sentences.en: In Europe, Aga Khan III presented himself in a completely different light.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲，阿迦汗三世表现得完全是另一副样子。

sentences.en: It was seven o’clock and just starting to get light.
sentences.cn: 那是早上7点钟，天刚蒙蒙亮。

sentences.en: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentences.cn: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentences.en: Light fittings with metal parts should always be earthed.
sentences.cn: 有金属部件的照明装置都应该走地线。

sentences.en: people who have suffered only light exposure to radiation
sentences.cn: 只受到轻度辐射的人

sentences.en: She was as light as a feather (= very light ) to carry.
sentences.cn: 她抱起来轻得很。

sentences.en: the audit portrayed the company in a very favourable light.
sentences.cn: 审计员作了对公司十分有利的描述。

sentences.en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentences.en: The company manufactures a range of innovative light-weight cycles.
sentences.cn: 这家公司生产一系列的新型轻便自行车。

sentences.en: The driver had failed to stop at a red light.
sentences.cn: 红灯亮时司机没有把车停下。

sentences.en: the exorbitant prices are explainable in the light of the facts.
sentences.cn: 考虑到实际情况，这么高的价钱也是情有可原的。

sentences.en: the exorbitant prices are explainable in the light of the facts.
sentences.cn: 考虑到实际情况，这么高的价钱也是情有可原的。

sentences.en: The janitor comes around to turn the lights out.
sentences.cn: 看门人回来把灯关掉。

sentences.en: The kitchen was light and spacious.
sentences.cn: 厨房明亮宽敞。

sentences.en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

sentences.en: The light's a bit too harsh. You can turn it off.
sentences.cn: 灯光有点太刺眼了。你可以把灯关掉。

sentences.en: The porch is always well lit at night.
sentences.cn: 夜里，门廊总是灯火通明。

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: The snow was light and noiseless as it floated down.
sentences.cn: 雪花轻盈飘落，无声无息。

sentences.en: The truck was quite light and easy to drive.
sentences.cn: 这辆卡车很轻，容易驾驶。

sentences.en: Under the shaded light her expression was difficult to read.
sentences.cn: 她的表情隐在阴影中，很难读懂。

sentences.en: We set out at first light the next day.
sentences.cn: 第二天天刚亮我们就出发了。

sentences.en: We waited for the lights to change.
sentences.cn: 我们等着红绿灯转换。

sentences.en: We’ll keep on looking while it’s still light.
sentences.cn: 我们会趁天亮继续寻找。

sentences.en: You can carry this bag – it’s fairly light.
sentences.cn: 你可以拿这个袋子——它很轻。

sentences.en: You look nice in light colours.
sentences.cn: 你穿浅色衣服很好看。

sentences.en: You should wear light, comfortable shoes.
sentences.cn: 你应该穿轻便舒适的鞋子。

words.tran_cn: 轻盈的；畅快的；轻率的；明亮的
轻轻地；轻松地；容易地；不费力地
轻盈；轻松；明亮；（颜色）浅淡

phrases.tran_cn: 暴露；真相大白；众所周知

phrases.phrase: in the light of (或北美in light of)
light at the end of the tunnel

phrases.tran_cn: 偶然遇见（碰见，发现）；停落于
点香烟：开始吸香烟或雪茄、烟斗

trans.tran_cn: 天色亮的，光线充足的，浅色的，轻便的，轻的，轻柔的，轻松的，少量的，愉快的，不严肃的，清淡的，松软的，低度酒的，易醒的
光，发光体，点火物，眼光，亮色，窗
trans.tran_en: one of a set of red, green, and yellow lights used for controlling traffic
one of a set of red, green, and yellow lights used for controlling traffic
to provide light for a place
to start to burn, or to make something start to burn
